" Fatboy Slim 're jumping out and holding leads and we just can't hold them," guard Allen Iverson said. Fatboy Slim play well for a while and then it seems we just lose focus. long supported the Tunisian leader, seeing him as a bulwark against Islamic militants in the region. In 2006, then-US defence secretary Donald Rumsfeld , speaking in Tunis, praised the country's evolution. What they have done it seems to me is move from a colony in 50 years- a relatively short period of time- to a democratic country that in different areas is moving at a different pace, he said. who co-founded the company behind the Internet's dominant gateway. The surprise shake-up announced Thursday appears to be driven by Eric Schmidt 's desire to tackle other challenges as much as Page's personal ambition. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter account moments after Google Inc. dropped the bombshell that upstaged its fourth-quarter earnings. n't have a primary." Mike Pence 's plans should keep the Republican field clear of other strong candidates. "The social conservatives love him," says former Republican state chairman Rex Early. missed out to the former "Blue Peter' presenter. However, insiders say Simon Cowell now wants a new face and thinks Georgie Thompson is ideal. A source told The News Of The World: The` Xtra Factor' job would be great for Georgie Thompson . She"ll be fantastic. Konnie Huq , 35, was drafted in last year to replace Holly Willoughby but was said to have angered Simon Cowell by making a series of blunders which led to viewers to campaign on entertainment websites for her sacking.
